channel.title: My Server Goals:
channel.description:
Hey guys, I'm making a server goals sheet because I'm trying to remake the F2P (Free to Play) version of Rune Scape. These, along with things from the real Rune Scape, will form one of the best servers. ▪ 1v1 and Team Player Killing. ▪ [s]Dueling anywhere.[/s] - DONE! ▪ [s]P2P to F2P transfers.[/s] - DONE! * ▪ Exact NPC's (Lumbridge Guide, Tutors, animals, etc.) ▪ Skill Capes [i]with[/i] proper emotes. ** ▪ New Quests and Mini-Quests. ▪ Tutorial Island. ▪ [s]Boosted exp.[/s] (40 exp per 1 hit) - DONE! If anyone can help me and add on to the list, that would be great. Thanks. :)
* [i]P2P to F2P transfers[/i] are transferred items that are members only, such as dragon, barrows, and whips. These items are coded into the server as a F2P item, and coded as a monster drop. ** If someone could help me with adding emotes, I'd would be SO happy! :)

item.title: My Server Goals:
item.dc:creator: @Pku_Skillz Pku Skillz
item.description:
@Pku_Skillz wrote:

Hey guys, I’m making a server goals sheet because I’m trying to remake the F2P (Free to Play) version of Rune Scape. These, along with things from the real Rune Scape, will form one of the best servers.

1v1 and Team Player Killing.
Dueling anywhere. - DONE!
P2P to F2P transfers. - DONE! *
Exact NPC’s (Lumbridge Guide, Tutors, animals, etc.)
Skill Capes with proper emotes. **
New Quests and Mini-Quests.
Tutorial Island.
Boosted exp. (40 exp per 1 hit) - DONE!

If anyone can help me and add on to the list, that would be great. Thanks.

* [i]P2P to F2P transfers[/i] are transferred items that are members only, such as dragon, barrows, and whips. These items are coded into the server as a F2P item, and coded as a monster drop.

** If someone could help me with adding emotes, I’d would be SO happy!

Read full topic
